abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32805177, pmid32804930, pmid32805057, pmid32777031, pmid32808685, pmid32531579, pmid32791558, pmid32790663
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.20
